review.title: A Characterization of the Dirichlet Distribution with Application to Learning Bayesian Networks
review.abstract: We provide a new characterization of the Dirichlet distribution. This characterization implies that under assumptions made by several previous authors for learning belief networks, a Dirichlet prior on the parameters is inevitable.
